profile:
Absolute Drying System LTD. is an insurance claim-approved disaster damage rebuild specialist located in Richmond, BC. For combined 25 years, our project management team has been involved in residential and commercial recovery and reconstruction. Repairing properties after water, mold, or fire damage is our expertise. We are there for you every step of the way at every stage of your disaster, including the initial inspection, which allows us to better understand how the damage was caused. If you need assistance with your insurance claim, we are there for the meeting with the adjuster so that we can agree on the repairs that are needed to have your business or home back to normal fast.

We are proud to be a one-stop provider of restoration, cleanup, and maintenance services for any residential or commercial property—no matter the size of the property or the scope of the project. Whether your property has suffered damage and you need post-restoration cleaning or you simply wish to set up an ongoing maintenance plan, ABSOLUTE Drying System Ltd. is ready to help.
products: Our services include residential & commercial repairs and maintenance. We are certified, licensed, and insurance-approved restoration & reconstruction specialists. We can provide all aspects of restoration services.
services: Water Damage Restoration, Fire Restoration, Storm Restoration, Mold Remediation, Odor Remove,  and Post- Restoration including Flooring, Drywall & Paint, Kitchen & Bath, Basement Renovation,
warranty_terms: 2 years of workmanship & 10 years of manufacture
name: Absolute Drying System LTD.

profile:
Since 1998, Precision Restorations Inc. has followed a philosophy of only hiring people who we would be happy to have working in our own homes—people who demonstrate courtesy and respect every time they meet our customers.

 

Our philosophy has served us well. It has resulted in a company with a difference. We are a company that respects and values the trust placed in us by homeowners, business owners and their insurance brokers and adjusters.

 

From our staff to our fleet and facility, Precision Restorations Inc. offers the most efficient and dedicated restoration and reconstruction in BC.

For 24/7 emergency property clean up in a hurry, rely on us at Precision Restorations Inc. Our experienced team of content restoration and building re-construction professionals mitigate damage and loss resulting from:

 

Fire

Water

Sewer

Wind

Vehicle Impact

Break & Enter

Vandalism

 

Make the smart choice when faced with a natural or man-made disaster, and choose Precision Restorations Inc. With our professional and courteous staff, up-to-date equipment, and materials, we will get you back into your home or back in business as quickly as possible.
services:
24 Hour Emergency Services
Fire, Flood, Wind & Vehicle Impact
Content Removal & Restoration

Restorative Drying

Mold Remediation

Water Extraction

Odour Removal

Building Board-up
specialities:
Our facilities are uniquely designed to avoid cross contamination and to assure steady and efficient processing of all content losses. This results in the highest quality at the most cost effective manner.

 

Ozone and Ultra Violet Light Deodorization Chamber

Humidity-Controlled Contents Drying Chamber

Complete Laundry and Cleaning Facility

Separate Contents Viewing Area

Individual Containers for Short and Long Term Storage
name: Precision Restorations Inc

profile:
Phoenix Restorations LTD provides 24 Hour Emergency Response for Fire, Water, Wind, B&E, Vandalism and Impact. Est. 1981 call 1-877-447-4400

Services we offer:

- 24 Hour Emergency Service
-Contents Cleaning, Fire Water and Wind Restoration repairs
-B&E, Vandalism & Impact
-Emergency Response Team
-Carpet & Upholstery cleaning
-Complete re-construction
-Residential, Commercial, Industrial
-Refrigerant & desiccant dehumidification
-Mold remediation
-Structure / Contents deodorizing
-Drying & Ozone chamber
-Electronics Processing
-Trauma scenes
-Document restoration
-Emergency management planning

Our specialty is mitigating each loss and reducing the length of time per claim. 
Providing experience - based on experience 24 hours a day!
History

Established in 1981.

Phoenix Restorations began in 1981 and services Metro Vancouver, the Fraser Valley and Canada wide. We are available for emergency service 24 hours a day 7 days a week.
